summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganBorn from 10 years of research. CeraVe Balancing Air Foam Facial Cleanser is powered by breakthrough patent-pending Glycolysine Cleansing Technology, to balance combination skin by gently and effectively cleansing the skin, providing 8-Hour Oil Control and 24-Hour Hydration.
details: DetailsFeaturesGently and effectively cleanses, hydrates, and controls oil for a healthier skin barrierBalances combination skin by providing 8-hour oil control and 24-hour hydration for a healthier skin barrierMade for combination skin. Gentle on all skin types, including sensitive skin.Free of Added Fragrance, Allergy Tested, and Non-Comedogenic.Item 2640161How To UseKeep upright when pumping. Massage cleanser into wet skin. Rinse. Avoid eye area. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately.Precautions: Avoid eye area. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride, Glycolipids, Disodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Niacinamide, Allantoin, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Ceramide Eop, Carbomer, Triethyl Citrate, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Salicylic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Coco-Betaine, Coconut Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Phytosphingosine, Xanthan Gum, Polyepsilon-Lysine, Benzoic Acid.
how_to_use: Keep upright when pumping. Massage cleanser into wet skin. Rinse. Avoid eye area. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately.Precautions: Avoid eye area. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I love cerave products. They've saved my skin on many occasions. I really like this face wash as it's for oily skin and removes dirt and makeup.  It almost has a really light coconut scent I love. Great product for sensitive skin and affordable. The package is so cute.

reviews.headline: Foamy and Gentle
reviews.comments: The reason I gave it 3 stars is because even though it's very soft and gentle on the skin I felt as if it left my skins very dry after then cleanse. The liquid was actually very foamy when being pumped out the bottle and the amount that you need is very little. I did love that about the product. Also didn't have a scent but your face did feel very clean after the use. A big plus that's it's very sensitive to the skin didn't break me out nor did it cause any irritation. Definitely worth it to try my only issue with this product was the after dryness on my face but if you have sensitive skin then I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.headline: Refreshing
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Lightweight and gentle, CeraVe Air Foam Cleanser leaves my skin clean without stripping moisture. The airy foam feels refreshing and rinses easily. Perfect for daily use, especially if you want a simple, effective, non-drying cleanser.

I received these products for free from Influenste and brand(s) in exchange for my honest review.

This is very bubbly and works very well at taking off makeup as well as cleaning my face. It smells a little like cucumber. I enjoyed using this product

reviews.headline: Amazing!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This cleanser is amazing! There's no scent to it so that makes it really gentle which I like. It feels really foamy and enjoyable to use. I like that cerave is a clean and gentle company. This cleanser cleans really well without overly stripping. Overall recommend this product! And I love the packaging.

reviews.headline: The CeraVe Balancing Air Foam Cleanser is a gentle, effectiv
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I recently tried the CeraVe Balancing Air Foam Cleanser, and I must say, it has quickly become a staple in my skincare routine.

The foam texture is light and airy, making it easy to apply. It spreads effortlessly across the skin and feels refreshing. I appreciate that it doesn't leave a heavy residue, which is often a concern with foam cleansers.

This cleanser does an excellent job of removing dirt, oil, and makeup without stripping my skin of its natural moisture. I have normal to combination skin, and I noticed that it balances my skin beautifully. After using it, my face feels clean but not tight, which is a huge plus.

I love that it contains Glycolic Acid and essential ceramides. The Glycolic Acid helps with gentle exfoliation, while the ceramides work to maintain the skin barrier. 

After a few weeks of use, I've noticed a significant improvement in my skin's texture and clarity. It feels hydrated and looks more radiant. I also appreciate that it's suitable for daily use, making it a versatile addition to my skincare routine.

Overall, I highly recommend the CeraVe Balancing Air Foam Cleanser for anyone looking for a gentle yet effective cleanser. It's a fantastic product that delivers on its promises, and I will definitely repurchase it!

reviews.headline: Nice Cleanser for Sensituve skin
reviews.comments: Another great and gentle cleanser from average. Perfect for my sensitive skin. Been a huge fan of the brand for years and this cleanser has been my new fave

reviews.headline: Great buy
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. Packaged great, no leaks or messes. Easy to open and use. It is foamy and works great. I love it, it smells fresh and clean. It works great for sensitive skin too.

reviews.headline: Great buy
reviews.comments: Packaged great, no leaks or messes. Easy to open and use. It is foamy and works great. I love it, it smells fresh and clean. It works great for sensitive skin too.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: This is product that does work great! The face wash does foam and keeps the foam texture while you apply it. It doesn't irritate or break out sensitive skin, also the face wash works great for everyday use. It's not overly expensive and I would recommend it.

reviews.headline: Frothy and lightweight
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Absolutely love how frothy and creamy this face wash is. The texture is so lightweight. I felt like this cleanser gently removed my excess oil without stripping my skin and leaving it dry. There is no scent which I think is beneficial for sensitive skin people. I love the packaging. I love the pump. I also really enjoy that it doesn't leak.

reviews.headline: love it!!!
reviews.comments: AMAZING, there is no more perfect word to describe it. The foam feels so good on in the face and it cleans perfectly, it is my current daily cleanser.i

reviews.headline: Part of everyday routine
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Has slight coconut smell but isn't overpowering. Have been using for a month and has definitely helped clear acne. It works great in the shower to remove makeup. The pump works but I feel it could give more product with each pump.

reviews.headline: Great cleanser for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This cleanser is amazing, i normally never use face cleansers i only do oil cleanse because i feel that regular face cleansers strip the oils of my face and make it feel really dry, i was little bit worried about this one since its a foam cleanser but it surprised me, i used it after oil cleansing and this cleanser was super light and brought back moisture to my face, im very happy i got to try this because it is a very good cleanser for most people.

reviews.headline: I would get this product again
reviews.comments: Very light weight and I enjoy the foam texture a lot more compared to the liquid alternative, but both are great I have been using both for a while. What I recommend is whichever feel you would like better either the lightweight foam or the liquid.

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: This product works totally fine and is fine for my skin, but the scent of it is so overpowering and overwhelming. If nothing else, it could be bad for sensitive skin due to the fragrance.

reviews.headline: Soft to skin
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] this cleanser is one of my best cleanser I have used so far. I never had foam cleanser before and it's soft on the skin and after washing my face I do feel squeaky clean. But I feel like this is good for days when you don't really need to double cleanse and just need quick cleansing options. I wouldn't use this if I have a face fully glammed up.

reviews.headline: Would buy again But has a of funky smell
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] It's got a good packaging, but honestly the sent is awful It smells absolutely terrible. Maybe it's just me and my preferences but it smells like greasy popcorn what was something else added to it to make it even worse for me honestly but all around it works I guess.

reviews.headline: Good product
reviews.comments: Good face wash. It is one of the best of what drug store offers. It doesn't have any sense. The packaging is decent. Product is decent it cleans without drying I would recommend it.

reviews.headline: Not my fave
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] not my favorite. Was very foamy and didn't feel like it cleansed my skin too well. I don't like this product but others may if they prefer foam cleansers.

faceoff_positive.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Cerave Balancing Air Foam Cleanser for normal to combination skin is a gentle cleanser for my oily acne prone skin. I've used it day and night for thirty days without issue or dryness or any increase in pimples. The cleanser is gentle enough to even be used a third or fourth time a day as it leaves skin feeling hydrated but not weighed down. 

I do not know if the cleanser felt like enough on my oiliest days or with using heavy amounts of sunscreen. A second cleanser might be helpful. 

The foam is airy, true to name. It's plush and pillowy on the face. However, since it's basically suds, I did feel like I had to use more product (usually 2-3 pumps) to have enough to work with to cover my large face as well as to "grab" the skin. I believe I have used the product somewhat more quickly than other Cerave gel foaming cleansers. 

The foam has a subtle, pleasant coconut scent probably from the coconut derived surfactants (disodium cocoyl glutamate, sodium methyl cocoyl taurate) as there is no added fragrance. This is the first Cerave cleanser I've had with a slight scentâ€”and I enjoy it! 

I think this cleanser is suitable for all skin types. But best for normal to combination skin for its effective but mild cleansing. It's definitely not stripping. 

Shown in the picture is my usual three pumps of air foam. 

[I received this product in exchange for my honest review]
faceoff_positive.headline: Fun product! Lightly coconut scented

faceoff_negative.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.   I'm going to be honest: this isn't my favorite cleanser.  Pros: no scent, light on the skin for summer, great for my combination skin.  Cons: bottle sometimes gets pumped at an angle just holding it because it's bug to pump out product, which causes weird pumps and indents, the packaging leaks when laying on it's side in a travel organizer in a car, not even an airplane, and the face wash doesn't work with silicone scrubbing devices, like a PMD, because it's too light and there's no product left to scrub around.  I'm going to be honest, I wanted to LOVE this product, but I just don't.  For me, the cons are too big with how I live my life. The formula of the face wash is good like you'd expect from CeraVe, but there's lots of good face washes out there now.  I personally would only recommend this to the person who stays at home and only uses their hands to wash their face.  If you ever plan on traveling with this, even in a car for a weekend get away or if you plan to use it with any sort of face scrubber, this isn't for you.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not For Travelers or People Who Use Silicone Face Scrubbers
